Position: Key Account Manager, Asia Pacific
Management of Key Account Consumer Asia Pacific business; $27M p.a

CAREER SUMMARY
2018 to date Stepan Asia Pte Ltd – Singapore
Position: Key Account Manager, Asia Pacific
Management of Key Account Consumer Asia Pacific business; $27M p.a
Developed and maintained long-term relationships in the global consumer products space connecting with key customer business executives and stakeholders
Responsibilities include contract negotiations, coordination of regional customer related projects, development of strategic regional sales and marketing key account plans
The role requires liaison between customers and cross-functional internal teams to ensure timely and successful delivery of solutions to meet fast-changing customer and consumer needs
Achievements:
Actively pursued business development for the region through strategic planning and qualified new customers for existing products to enable double digit revenue growth targeting higher growth sectors (e.g. fabric softener - India, Indonesia, Vietnam; hair care - China, Indonesia, Thailand)
2017 – 2018: Albemarle – Singapore
Position: Director of Sales, Asia Pacific
Managed the company’s FCC catalyst business in Asia Pacific (AP); US$ 150M annual sales revenue.
Lead a team of eight sales managers and technical service engineers.
Restructured and built resources within the AP region to drive growth and efficiencies.
Prepared annual operating plan, associated strategic and operational account plans for the AP sales territory including clear, actionable items for sales, technical service and R&D teams.
Administered and negotiated commercial and technical bids and performance guarantees.
Defined and started implementation of the company’s Go to Market strategy for AP:
Reviewed establishment of legal entities foreign owned enterprises and representative offices in each of the countries in which the company conducts business with legal, logistics and business teams.
Resource planning to replace the existing agent/distributor network.
Termination of all existing agent/distributor contracts in AP region.
2013 – 2017 Grace GmbH & Co. KG, Worms Germany
Position: Director of Technical Sales Southern Europe
Managed Grace’s FCC catalyst business in southern Europe; US$ 70M annual sales revenue.
Supervised a team of eight sales and technical service managers and assistants.
Introduced Sandler Sales Training and Value Selling concept and tools, tailored to Grace’s FCC business, to the sales and technical service team in EMEA through a series of webinars, internal presentations and workshops to target an overall improvement in the profitability of the business.
Standardised the FCC product portfolio with marketing:
Focus on products demonstrating superior technical performance that command premium pricing.
Increase operational effectiveness in terms of extending production run lengths, minimizing downtime by product change-over, cleaning of equipment and losses etc and reducing inventory levels.
Sales were grown by US$ 10M per annum over a 3-year period despite the declining FCC catalyst market in Europe, which was the consequence of continued refinery closures.
Profitability was increased in the face of annual index-related deflationary price adjustments.
Key customers were retained; new customers were gained, meaning that Grace’s sales and profitability targets were exceeded. This was achieved by having a deep understanding of our customers, from what is driving the decisions of the key stakeholders, to the overall business objectives and value chains. Providing customer value was a vital element, but no more so than effectively communicating and selling that value throughout their organization at multiple levels.
2011 – 2013 UOP Products Germany GmbH (Honeywell UOP), Erkrath, Germany
Position: Catalyst, Adsorbents & Specialties Sales Manager (EMEA)
Managed sales of catalysts, adsorbents and specialties to the refinery and petrochemical customer base in Austria, Ger

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
